name: BonesOfTheInferno(Demo)
description:
"Their bones shall be the pillars and obelisks that will forge something akin to the thorns on a rose bush, a fortress, but not for defense for oneself but for those outside of it's walls."

A rpg maker vx ace, horror and yuri game made for the yuri game jam.

Please note, that not only is this a demo, but some individuals may require the font, "Acid" in order to get the best out of their experience

Warning Flashing Lights
